txt.en: 'Pelts and meat are all necessary for our visiting travellers, but we would be remiss if we sent them away without medicines. Along the Bruinen below there is a place called the Blooming Fens. A rare flower grows there which is purported to have wondrous healing properties. It is not athelas, mind you, but it would serve better than most herbs.\n\n'Would you travel to the fens and bring me that flower? Be careful, for bog-lurkers dwell there, and they have become wild in recent days.'
Canaddal is posted at the head of the path leading into the High Moor, high above the Blooming Fens.\n\nYou should bring the flower you collected to Canaddal at once.
A rare flower grows in a place along the Bruinen called the Blooming Fens, a place where bog-lurkers dwell. The flower is most beautiful and is purported to have wondrous healing properties.
'Indeed, this flower is wondrous fair to look upon. Thank you, [placeholder]. I am certain our friends will appreciate your efforts.'
The rare flower grows in the Blooming Fens along the Bruinen.\n\nCanaddal has asked you to collect a rare flower to make medicine for the visiting travellers.
Bring the rare flower to Canaddal
